entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain or drizzle beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm except 10 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or drizzle. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm except 10 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 14.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to a few showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
